Package Alertas

Class Alerta

  • java.lang.Object
    • Alertas.Alerta
  • public class Alerta
extends java.lang.Object
    General Alerta class - auxiliary class that adds values to the Temperature and Humidity buffers, gets the values from the Sistema table(the values that the user defined for the system) and sends the Alerta to the table.

      static void setUltimoAlarmeCrescimentoTemperatura​(java.lang.String ultimoAlarmeCrescimentoTemperatura)  
      static void setUltimoAlarmeLimiteHumidade​(java.lang.String ultimoAlarmeLimiteHumidade)  
      static void setUltimoAlarmeLimiteTemperatura​(java.lang.String ultimoAlarmeLimiteTemperatura)  
      static boolean verificarSeMandaAlerta​(java.lang.String dataAntiga, java.lang.String dataNova)
      Checks weather if an alert should be sent if there is one already of the same type sent before - for example if the user says he should receive an alert of the same type every 5 minutes, this methods checks if there is a new alert to be sent of an x type, if the last one received of the x type by the user was longer than 5 minutes ago then it will be sent another alert of the x type.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • irBuscarBuffersAlerta

        public static int irBuscarBuffersAlerta()

      • adicionaValor

        public static void adicionaValor​(Medicao medicao)
        The Alerta Buffer works in a FIFO way. If it's the first Medicao it calls a method to read from the Sistema table. If it's not checks if the buffer is full to check for Alertas and removes the first element(oldest element), if it's not full adds it to the buffer.
        Parameters:
        medicao - Medicao to add to the buffers according to it's type.

      • buscarIntervaloEntreAlertas

        public static java.lang.Double buscarIntervaloEntreAlertas()

      • buscarValoresTabelaSistema

        public static void buscarValoresTabelaSistema()

      • getLimite

        public static java.lang.Double getLimite​(java.lang.String tipoMedicao)

      • verificarSeMandaAlerta

        public static boolean verificarSeMandaAlerta​(java.lang.String dataAntiga,
                                             java.lang.String dataNova)
        Checks weather if an alert should be sent if there is one already of the same type sent before - for example if the user says he should receive an alert of the same type every 5 minutes, this methods checks if there is a new alert to be sent of an x type, if the last one received of the x type by the user was longer than 5 minutes ago then it will be sent another alert of the x type.
        Parameters:
        dataAntiga - Older date to compare
        dataNova - Newer date to compare
        Returns:
        wether a new alert should be sent

      • getUltimoValor

        public static Medicao getUltimoValor​(java.lang.String tipoMedicao)
        Returns:
        Last value in the buffer

      • getPrimeiroValor

        public static Medicao getPrimeiroValor​(java.lang.String tipoMedicao)
        Returns:
        First value in the buffer

      • enviaAlerta

        public static void enviaAlerta​(java.lang.String descricao,
                               Medicao medicao,
                               java.lang.String limite)
        Calls the SP responsible to write in the Alerta table the new alert.
        Parameters:
        descricao - What the alert should be named
        medicao - The Medicao containing the value, type and date
        limite - The limit, in % or absolute, that triggered the alert
